title: #144: The Autopsy continued  in “The Staircase”
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) continue their discussions about Kathleen Peterson’s autopsy examination and report by Dr Radisch and address some of our listeners questions.


#HerNameWasKathleenPeterson

#TheStaircase
